verbose_text: As one of the potential mechanisms for its anti-diabetic effect, it has been reported that D-pinitol increases insulin mediated glucose uptake in the liver by activating the phosphatidylinositol-3-kinase (PI3K)/Akt signalling pathway in a type 2 diabetic experimental rat model.
evidence: glucose uptake in the liver by activating the phosphatidylinositol-3-kinase (PI3K)/Akt signalling pathway
